name: part_004
file: tmp_【重大告知アリ＆3D LIVE】秘密結社holoX4周年 3DLIVE【#SSholoX4周年】 [Z_E5w_pYAck]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: La+ Darknesss performs her solo song 'Kyoumi nai yo' (I'm Not Interested).
Transition sequence with traditional Japanese aesthetics (bamboo, lanterns) leading into Kazama Iroha's performance.
Kazama Iroha performs her solo song 'Honto no Watashi' (The Real Me).

subtitles.original: 私は何で好きなんだって　問い正さなきゃね
subtitles.english: I have to ask myself why I like you so much.

subtitles.original: 最低なあなた　あの子の方がいいんだもんね
subtitles.english: You're the worst. That girl is better for you anyway.

subtitles.original: 私興味ないよ　君なんて　中途半端に舐めた真似
subtitles.english: I'm not interested in you, making half-hearted, mocking attempts.

subtitles.original: ロックでビッチなこの愛に　壊されないでいい
subtitles.english: You don't have to be destroyed by this rock 'n' roll, bitchy love.

subtitles.original: 止めどないよ　君の愛を独り占めしたい
subtitles.english: It's unstoppable. I want to monopolize your love.

subtitles.original: 特攻だろうがなんだろうが　抱きしめてあげたい
subtitles.english: Whether it's a suicide mission or whatever, I want to hold you tight.

subtitles.original: 来世契約　独占のホリデイズ　逃がさないずっと
subtitles.english: A contract for the next life, exclusive holidays. I'll never let you go.

subtitles.original: 君が好きってこの感情に　騙されてる
subtitles.english: I'm being deceived by this feeling of "liking you."

subtitles.original: 大事な方は君か　確か決めかねてる
subtitles.english: I haven't decided if you're the important one.

subtitles.original: 私興味ないよ　君なんて　ただ振り回して好きなだけ
subtitles.english: I'm not interested in you. I just like to boss you around.

subtitles.original: ロックでビップなこの愛を　渡さないから
subtitles.english: I won't give away this rock 'n' roll, VIP love.

subtitles.original: 馬鹿だよね　色ボケだね　それ見たことかだってさ
subtitles.english: You're a fool, aren't you? Blinded by love. "I told you so," they'll say.

subtitles.original: もう他でもない　あなたに呪われたまま
subtitles.english: No one else but you has me under a spell.

subtitles.original: 私興味ないよ　君なんて　馬鹿なフリしてあげただけ
subtitles.english: I'm not interested in you. I was just playing dumb.

subtitles.original: 愛と哀をぶつけ合って　ぐちゃぐちゃになって
subtitles.english: Clashing love and sorrow until it's all a mess.

subtitles.original: 私興味ないよ　君なんて　中途半端に舐めた真似
subtitles.english: I'm not interested in you, making half-hearted, mocking attempts.

subtitles.original: ロックでビッチなこの愛に　壊されないでいい
subtitles.english: You don't have to be destroyed by this rock 'n' roll, bitchy love.

subtitles.original: 見た目だけじゃわからない　私のこと可愛いだなんて
subtitles.english: You can't tell just by looks. Thinking I'm cute...

subtitles.original: まさか思っていないよね？　私の本当を知っていてほしい
subtitles.english: You don't actually think that, do you? I want you to know the real me.

subtitles.original: ホントノワタシ
subtitles.english: The Real Me

subtitles.original: やっと覚悟したの　反動不足も事態も問わない
subtitles.english: I've finally made up my mind. I don't care about the backlash or the situation.

subtitles.original: おすまし顔でいるけど　心は常に蒼白く燃え
subtitles.english: I keep a composed face, but my heart is always burning pale blue.

subtitles.original: 諦めはしない　媚びたりもしない　私負けない
subtitles.english: I won't give up. I won't flatter anyone. I won't lose.

subtitles.original: 扱いづらい奴だとも　甘く見ると痛い目見るぞ
subtitles.english: Even if I'm hard to handle, if you underestimate me, you'll regret it.

subtitles.original: それでも時々には　逃げ出してしまいたい
subtitles.english: Even so, sometimes I want to run away.

subtitles.original: そんな衝動に弱音吐き出す　夜もある
subtitles.english: There are nights when I give in to those impulses and voice my weaknesses.

subtitles.original: ほんの小さな小さな妥協が　積み重なり重なって動けない
subtitles.english: Slight, tiny compromises pile up until I can't move.

subtitles.original: 大きな大きな我を通し　未来を狭めてしまうから
subtitles.english: If I force my big, stubborn ego, it will narrow my future.

subtitles.original: どんなに苦しくても辛くても　後悔だけはしない
subtitles.english: No matter how painful or hard it is, I won't have any regrets.

subtitles.original: 生き方の重荷さ　建前じゃなくて生き方なんだ
subtitles.english: It's the burden of my way of life. It's not a pretense, it's how I live.

subtitles.original: 現実と理想の距離を　縮められなかったとしても
subtitles.english: Even if I couldn't bridge the gap between reality and my ideals.

subtitles.original: おすまし顔でいるだけ　何事もなかったかのように
subtitles.english: I just keep a composed face, as if nothing happened.

subtitles.original: 立ち止まりはしない　後戻りもしない　夢を捨てない
subtitles.english: I won't stop. I won't go back. I won't give up on my dreams.

subtitles.original: 私らしくとか　らしくとか...
subtitles.english: Being myself, or like myself...
